definitions.definition: Any garment worn underneath others, especially one worn next to the skin; an item of underwear .
Temple garments worn by the followers of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

main_definition: Any garment worn underneath others, especially one worn next to the skin; an item of underwear .
secondary_definitions: ( religion , in the plural ) Temple garments worn by the followers of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
